title: SupplierPack
description: Indicates that a specific supplier is capable of producing a specific pack specification.

packSpecificationId.description: Reference to a PackSpecification by its unique identifier

supplierId.title: ChannelSupplier ID Reference

status.title: SupplierPackStatus
status.description: Indicates the current state of the supplier pack approval process.
